name: Colorful Squares
description:
You must match squares of the same color horizontally. The gray squares with an X cannot be destroyed, so try to pile them to a corner so they are out of the way. You get more score by chaining 3 squares next to each other. You can also create chain reactions which give even more score, if you can find the space to set them up.

Controls: You can move squares left, right and speed them up.

Player 1: Left, right and down arrow keys.

Player 2: A, D & S.

Enter restarts the game after it is over. Esc returns to the main menu.
